question: Find the length of Line_A_M_0.
qt_description: Line Line_A_M_0 (Description: Connect vertex A with midpoint M_0 (of line L0))
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 5-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 5, rotation angle pi/5 radians. Total 2 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Circumscribed 5-sided polygon (center O1). Round 2: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Inscribed 5-sided polygon (center O1). Found 11 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 0 new lines and 0 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 10, total arcs: 0, total points: 11.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Connect vertex A with midpoint M_0 (of line L0)
api_results:
In the given geometric construction, a regular pentagon centered at O1 with side length 5 is first circumscribed by another regular pentagon (also centered at O1), and then a third regular pentagon is inscribed within the second, maintaining the same center. This yields a nested configuration of three concentric regular pentagons. Eleven distinct points are identified, including vertices and intersections. In the final step, a line segment is drawn from vertex A (a vertex of the outermost pentagon) to M_0, the midpoint of side L0 (a side of the outermost pentagon). 

Find the length of segment AM₀.
